ygData.subject: A few compents to several things....in 1 post !!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: look guys Im learning. Got a few compents to a few things. Mostly just ranting and stupid compents about nothing realy. And , bah I dont know. Billy Barnett:
ygData.messageBody:
look guys Im learning.
Got a few compents to a few things.
Mostly just ranting and stupid compents about nothing realy.
And , bah I dont know.

Billy Barnett: Warriorguilds in faydwer

You can kelethin. Just train through the window.
I think it is still possible, before you could bank through the
window too but they moved the banker witht the new patch I think, they might
have done the
same witht the warrior trainer
In Ak'anon its easier but dangerous, I got stuck there once and had to kill
myself to
get out (no gm was on). just walk up to one of the robot guides and say
where warrior guild

when you get there take a right and then its behind one of the doors.
But dont fall in the hole thats in the area.....its a pain to get up (read
impossible)



David Rogers: running through runneyey

I havent times it but I think more then 30 seconds through is slow.
Im probably gona go back to qey soon And I can time it then hehee
If you are going to qey you will go riverval,runnyeye,beholders maze,
karanas
beholders maze is easy too. If you take it easy. all I have encountered
there
are the easier for of minos and lesser mudites. The path from runny zone to
karana zone
isnt realy crowded. just keep the wall on the left side at all times and you
will get
to karanas pretty fast.
I read lots of posts saying that it can take several hours to travel from
free to qey.
Thats only if you run the water ways I think.
I always run the path(done the trip 10+ times and I have gotten killed
one(stupidity)).
If you do it once and you know the way its not that hard. then its "only"
the
griffs,giants,eyes and bandits that can psuh you around heheeh.

good luck

Dubas: Bronze armor.

There shouldnt be more bronze in the game IMHO.
Bronze wasnt made for level 13 players. Im 15 and Im 1 piece away from full
banded.
I guess there are server differances but 40pp for nice armor? I think thats
a decent prize.
Personaly Im just gona get a bronze helmet for now so I dont have to go
around lookin like a fool.

Some people will always take the easy route, when I strted playing the char
I play now I saw a level 7
warrior un full STEEL plate, no no stinkin bronze.....but how fun is it for
him the next 20 or so
levels when he cante upgrade anything and he wont get to earn anything
himself.

but the problem remains...if someone would give me the best armor in the
game would I say no?
hehe hell no, Id take it and wear it all day.

what do I want to say with this? I have no idea.
